title: Danny Blanchflower on Global Markets: A Shock Is Coming (Audio)
itunes:title: Danny Blanchflower on Global Markets: A Shock Is Coming (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Leading labour economist Danny Blanchflower, Professor of Economics at Dartmouth College, on the ECB leaving rates unchanged.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
